segments.text: I see the adult woman drying a plate, her expression calm and unbothered.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems to be in her own little bubble, disconnected from the world around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that overflowing sink is a disaster waiting to happen, and she doesn’t even know it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s upsetting to think about what could happen if she slips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being mischievous too, trying to steal cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is risking it all for a snack, and I can’t help but feel a mix of admiration and disbelief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His body is stretched to the max, poised on that unsteady stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl watches him with eager eyes, and I can almost feel her impatience.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to shout out a warning, to tell them to be careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I’m frozen, watching this play out like a spectator in a dangerous game.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Just beyond the window, the garden stands still, unaware of the chaos unfolding inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost comical how unaware the woman is while the kids orchestrate their little heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she would react if she knew the full story of what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This contrast of calm and chaos fascinates me, but it also terrifies me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just wish someone would wake up to the reality of this moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
